page.topic: Working with a Browse in Design Mode
page.description: A number of short procedures for working with a browse. Topics include changing a browse's dimensions, removing fields from a browse, and adding fields to a browse

section.title: Changing the Browse's Dimensions
section.description: To change the height or width of a browse:

step.description: Select either the bottom or right edge of the browse.
Stretch the browse window to the desired size.
Click a column heading to highlight it.
The field is no longer displayed.

section.title: Adding Fields to a Browse
section.description: To add a field to a Browse:

step.description: Drag the field from the Drag and Drop List and drop it into the browse. Browse Drag-and-Drop List:
